title: The Collected Regrets Of Clover
author: Mikki Brammer
description: The Collected Regrets of Clover follows death doula Clover Brooks as she embarks on a journey of self-discovery, confronting her own fears and regrets. Through helping others in their final moments, she learns to embrace life and find joy.

title: Cinder
author: Marissa Meyer
description: A science fiction retelling of the Cinderella fairy tale, set in a futuristic world where humans and androids coexist.

title: Six Crimson Cranes
author: Elizabeth Lim
description: Six Crimson Cranes follows Princess Shiori as she embarks on a magical journey to break a curse that turned her six brothers into cranes and save her kingdom.

title: Deadly
author: Naomi Novik
description: Deadly follows a young girl seeking vengeance against a malevolent witch who destroyed her family, leading her into a perilous journey filled with magic and betrayal.

title: We Should All Be Feminists
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
description: We Should All Be Feminists is a compelling essay by Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie that argues for the necessity of feminism and inclusivity in addressing gender inequality

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The Great Gatsby is a classic novel that tells the story of Jay Gatsby's obsession with wealth and love in 1920s America, revealing the disillusionment behind the American Dream.

title: Dark and Hollow Star
author: Ashley Shuttleworth
description: A Dark and Hollow Star follows four teens with hidden powers as they navigate a dangerous world of fae and magic in Toronto, confronting dark forces and unraveling a series of mysterious murders.

title: Legendborn
author: Tracy Deonn
description: Legendborn follows Bree Matthews as she uncovers a secret society linked to Arthurian legends and discovers her own magical abilities while navigating grief and identity.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: Pride and Prejudice is a classic novel about Elizabeth Bennet's journey through love and social expectations as she confronts her feelings for the proud Mr. Darcy.

title: Shadows of Enternity
author: Gregory Benford
description: Shadows of Eternity follows scientists who confront the challenges of time travel and communication with a dying civilization, exploring the existential themes of humanity and the universe.

title: Shadows in the Mist
author: Brian Moreland
description: Shadows in the Mist follows WWII soldiers in New Guinea who confront ancient supernatural horrors while battling the chaos of war.

title: If it Bleeds
author: Stephen King
description: If It Bleeds is a collection of four novellas by Stephen King, including a gripping tale featuring detective Holly Gibney as she unravels a deadly mystery.

title: The Sunbearer Trials
author: Aiden Thomas
description: Sunbearer Trials follows Teo, a young sunbearer, as he faces dangerous challenges in a competition for the sun gods, uncovering secrets and testing his courage along the way.

title: Supernova
author: Marissa Meyer
description: Supernova concludes the Renegades trilogy as Nova Artino confronts her past and fights for freedom in a climactic battle between heroes and villains.

title: Thief River Falls
author: Brian Freeman
description: Thief River Falls follows true crime writer Lisa Power as she investigates a mysterious disappearance and uncovers dark secrets in a small Minnesota town.

title: An illusion of Thieves
author: Cate Glass
description: The story follows Romy, a former courtesan to the Shadow Lord, who must rely on her hidden sorcery and newfound allies to stop a plot that threatens civil war.

title: The Way of Rings
author: Brandon Sanderson
description: The Way of Kings is an epic fantasy novel that follows the lives of several characters in the world of Roshar, as they navigate political intrigue, magical powers, and the mysteries of the world.

title: Wayword Son
author: Rainbow Rowell
description: Wayward Son follows Simon Snow and his friends as they embark on a road trip across America, confronting their pasts and discovering new adventures along the way.

title: Whispers of The Forgotten
author: Ismail Ulas
description: It's a journey that takes readers through ancient civilizations, lost knowledge, and hidden secrets.

title: To Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A novel about a teenager named Holden Caulfield who is expelled from his prep school and wanders around New York City.
